item.title: 预测现在
item.author: Manwei Liu
item.description: 用搜索数据预测现在或近未来。 1 The parable of Google Flu: Traps in big data analysis 用搜索数据预测流感——的一些问题。 Big data hubris The initial version of GFT was a particularly problematic marriage of big and small data. Essentially, the methodology was to find the best matches among

item.title: Big data is like teenage sex
item.author: Manwei Liu
item.description: Quote Big data is like teenage sex: everyone talks about it, nobody really knows how to do it, everyone thinks everyone else is doing it, so everyone claims they are doing it. –Dan Ariely 1 The End of Theory: The Data Deluge Makes the Scientific Method Obsolete “相关不等于因果”这句话已经刻进了科学家的DN
